title: Insights into the sustainability of liquid chromatographic methods for favipiravir bioanalysis: a comparative study
content:

The introduction of favipiravir as a broad-spectrum antiviral agent, particularly in treating influenza and exploring its potential against COVID-19, emphasizes the necessity for efficient analytical methods.
